word: \n     And why did the delinquent do this? Here is his answer: \"I knew thee that thou art a hard man, reaping where thou hast not sown, and gathering where thou hast not strewed.\" The Lord replies, \"Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee, thou wicked servant. Thou knewest that I was an austere man, taking up that I laid not down, and reaping that I did not sow; wherefore then gavest thou not my money into the bank, that at my coming I might have received mine own with usury?\"
